derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French déclamer or Latin declamare, from de- (expressing thoroughness) + clamare 'to shout'

entry.def: If you declaim, you speak dramatically, as if you were acting in a theatre.

example.ex: He raised his right fist and declaimed: 'Liar and cheat!'...
